channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 28th November
item.description:
Disgusting to see the amount of fly tipping happening in this one corner, this can attract rats and other animals. It is a very unpleasant site, can this please be dealt with!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stuart Road, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicles are illegally turning left onto Gloucester Place, 28th November
item.description:
Vehicles are illegally turning left onto Gloucester Place due to road work signage that is in direct conflict with the traffic signals on site - they need removing ASAP for H&S issue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): George Street, Marylebone, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tipping by a frequent white van, 28th November
item.description:
White van has approached again and unloaded a full vehicle worth of furniture and dumped them by the bins. This is not the 1st time, more like the 10th but council won't let us report them. Next to communal bins behind co-op.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eynsham Drive, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 28th November
item.description:
Graffiti on green wood, blue wood and brick wall.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich High Road, Greenwich

item.title: Fly tipped rubbish, 28th November
item.description:
Cardboard boxes, pillows, lamp, litter.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich High Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 28th November
item.description:
Take a look Upton Park Boleyn bus stop

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree sapping got run over, 28th November
item.description:
I saw one of the small tree saplings with the metal wire around it for it to grow knocked over with the tree fully laying down. Luckily it was small enough for me to get it up right but I feel like a bit of wind would knock it down. If it’s still standing it’s metal structure is all mangled and I’m guessing the tree needs to re replanted or something.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastern Way, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on side of 25 West Square (corner of Austral Street), 27th November
item.description:
Part of the graffiti has been there for some years but in recent weeks .months it has multiplied, and it has been added to in the last few days

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, West Square, Elephant and Castle, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big bins overflowing, 27th November
item.description:
This is a continuous issue. 3 big bins constantly overflowing. 3 more needed urgently

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37-48, Marshalsea Road, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wellington Gardens needs sweeping, 27th November
item.description:
Wellington Gardens needs swiping, plastic bottles and litter on the pathway. Also there's a foul odour in proximity of n 40 which is clearly noticeable from the street, especially during last summer (possibly sewage?). It's unclear where it comes from. Thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wellington Gardens, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Smashed glass been on floor here for weeks, 27th November
item.description:
There has been broken glass on this part of the cycle lane for weeks now (where the cycle lane merges onto Willowbrook Bridge. Please could it be cleared, and some sort of deterrent put in place to stop people making a dangerous mess on this canal path again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Nutt Street, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A loose manhole cover on Greenwich High Road at the junction with Royal Hill, 27th November
item.description:
This loose manhole cover makes a loud clicking noise each time a vehicle drives over it. It has been very disturbing especially late at night and during the night. It has been going on for weeks now.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Greenwich High Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Oven and Box with Hobs Left on Street (again), 27th November
item.description:
Someone keeps dumping household items on the street. They always appear outside #4 worlingham road. This week, it is a full oven, and a box for some hobs (which appears to be full of tiles). Please can someone remove these itemts ASAP, and send some sort of enforcement letter to the house outside which the fly tipping seems to be happening.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Worlingham Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kids playhouse dumped on pavement, 27th November
item.description:
Residents of 91 continually leaving items on pavement in hope others will clear away. Currently a kids playhouse half blocking the pavement, which has been there for at least a week

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, Greenway, Elmstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 27th November
item.description:
Wooden pallets left on side of road blocking path, fly tipping. Present since 25 November.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Parkview Road, Eltham

item.title: Park Hall Road SE21 opposite side of th, 27th November
item.description:
Park Hall Road SE21 opposite side of the road to Martell Road junction (/ “Park Court”) is a bus stop with a black square metal litter bin next to it – bin tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Hall Road, West Norwood, Greater London

item.title: Park Hall Road SE21 / Robson Road junction there, 27th November
item.description:
Park Hall Road SE21 / Robson Road junction there is a green plastic road sweeper’s bag bin which is tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/place/Park+Hall+Rd,+London/@51.434773,-0.0960974,3a,75y,148.66h,98.61t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sHvMa-15Xqt1ENjsdJECmOQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D-8.608457849877084%26panoid%3DHvMa-15Xqt1ENjsdJECmOQ%26yaw%3D148.66380179023867!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x487603ff357ceb67:0x87cc432c383eaa9!8m2!3d51.4358246!4d-0.0920412!16s%2Fg%2F1tdr7ns9?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTEyMy4xIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Datchelor Place, Camberwell, Greater London
